titles.title: Pandemic Fishery Disaster Response Act
To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add a pandemic as a potential cause of a fishery resource disaster.

bill.summary:
Pandemic Fishery Disaster Response Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Commerce to provide disaster relief for commercial fishery failures that occur because of a pandemic.
